it will works: 
1. download the newest Dameon Tools Lite http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads
2. enable all file type integration
3. Mount the Moto Racer 3 Gold Edition.bin
4. Install game and programs
5. Copy the MotoRacer3.exe from POSTMORTEM directory to the game directory and replace the old exe
6. Let's play!

Have a good game!

In order to mount the image in DAEMON Tools you need to rename "Moto Racer 3 Gold Edition.bin" to "pm-motog.bin". 

The reason is that the first line of the cue file list that as the filename of the image

FILE "pm-motog.bin" BINARY
TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
INDEX 01 00:00:00
